name: Fondazzjoni Nanniet Malta
goal: Nanniet (Grandparents) Malta is a community-based organisation which has the goal to improve the relationship and well-being between Grandparents and their Grandchildren through collective activities benefiting themselves and their community.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, European Neighbourhood Policy, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
Active Ageing
Combating Solitude, Isolation & Abandonment
Grandparents Visitation Rights
Dignified Independent Living
Caring for the Elderly at home & Elderly Homes
Health & Safety
Mental Health
Addressing Dementhia
